title: realme SLED 139 cm (55 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV  (RMV2001 SLED TV 55)

product_specification.In The Box: 1U Contains: LED TV 1N,Remote control 1N,Batteires 2N,Manual 1N,QSG 1N,Stands 2N,Stand Installation Instructions 1N
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MPG, MPEG, MPEG2 -PS, MP4, MKV, AVI, ASF, FLV
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Domestic Warranty and 2 Years on Panel
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: 1. Covered under Standard Installation - Table mounting using standard stand supplied as accessory with TV Extra charges are applicable for wall mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32" display size and Rs. 499 for >32" display size, except 55" display size which is free of cost - Connecting with available power source (within 1 meter) - Connecting / Setting up various available input source for Audio Video based on model - Connecting with available wifi (for smart TV) - Checking TV for proper functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its features

product_description.SLED 4K Display: Featuring the SLED technology, this TV has an ultra-wide colour gamut and an incredibly high NTSC colour space. All this only makes for a stunning picture quality that is loaded with vivid and life-like colours and fine detail.
product_description.TUV Rheinland Low Blue Light: This TV is also quite easy on your eyes as it has very low blue light emission. It’s TUV Rheinland Low Blue Light certified, so you know that your eyes are safe from the harmful effects of blue light.

review:
Here is the detailed review of realme SLED
Earlier I have use normal LED and QLED TV. So the review we will be according to that.
Display- if we compared to normal LED it is far far ahead of that. In comparison to QLED, this TV is directly giving the competition to it. Hence it can go against Q LED TV at lower price range.

Audio- for a normal living room 24 watt sound output it is perfectly balanced since it comes along with Dolby audio and quad speakers, it's a good choice rather than 50 Wa...
READ MORE

Pros:
1) Very Slim bezels.
2) Amazing picture quality.
3) Blacks and whites have been seperated well.
4) Sound quality is more than good and loud for normal usage.
5) Stock Android ui and easy to use remote.
6) Good wifi, bluetooth connectivity standards and sufficient ports.

Cons:
1) Lacks Dolby vision but has chroma boost inbuilt so compensates somewhat.
2) Lacks Dolby Atmos but has Dolby Audio but soundbar is required for completely cinematic experience like realme also advertises.
3) By default the whites are too bright that dynamic range suffers in some areas but can be easily fixed in settings.
4) Ports position could have been more accessible.
5) Newer version of Android TV should have been there as already 11th version is out and it has 9.
6) Or atleast 2 Gb ram should have been provided as memory management of Android TV 9 version isn't as good as newer versions. But not a huge noticeable difference due to good processor. Hopefully it would be updated to newer versions soon.

Overall modern looking TV with awesome display quality and audio is decent, as well as accompanied by stock Android and Chromecast.

Hello
I bought real mi 55 inch tv from flipkart in january it is spoiled by the end of March. Complainant said that repairer will come to your house and repair the TV but no one has come to repair the TV again. Calling back in flipkart from where it was said that we have no responsibility. You call in realme store. Wrote our complaint and said that the engineer will repair such TV in your house in five days. After five days the engineer came to repair the TV and the TV did not work again. The same problem again. But so far no one came to our house and the TV in our house has been off for the last three months. There is no solution to the problem. Even after complaining frequently, our problem has not been solved and now we do not see such repaired TV. Can you refund the full amount of TV or give us a new TV because you have sent me a damaged TV because three The current TV has been off for the last three months today. This has caused a lot of questions in my house as well. We have no means of entertainment as we have to go out of the house during Corona's time and we had only one TV which is also broken and the company is nothing. I am now going to file a consumer protection complaint a

Overall good product. Viewing angles arent too great. Bright pictures tend to feel washed out when viewed from the sides. The ui can feel sluggish at times, hoping updates will fix this. Other than that no issues. From normal angles picture quality is really good, specially for hdr enabled content. SD content upscaling could have been better. On the whole, for what you're paying it's more than worth it!

Update (after 5months): the UI can become sluggish at times. TV hangs every now and then as well. I believe this has got to do with Android TV in general though. Other than that, love it.
